enWisdom: Treachery is the quality of the wicked

Wisdom: الْغَدْرُ لِأَهْلِ الْغَدْرِ وَفَاءٌ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: Treachery with the treacherous is loyalty in the sight of Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: الْوَفَاءُ لِأَهْلِ الْغَدْرِ غَدْرٌ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: Being loyal to the treacherous is treachery in the sight of Allah, the Glorified
Treachery is the worst of the two betrayals

Wisdom: الْغَدْرُ بِكُلِّ أَحَدٍ قَبِيحٌ وَهُوَ بِذِي الْقُدْرَةِ وَالسُّلْطَانِ أَقْبَحُ
enWisdom: Treachery by everyone is evil, but by those who have power and authority it is worse
Treachery increases the burden [of sin] and degrades one’s status

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالْغَدْرِ فَإِنَّهُ أَقْبَحُ الْخِيَانَةِ وَإِنَّ الْغَدُورَ لَمُهَانٌ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ [بِغَدْرِهِ‏]
enWisdom: Beware of treachery, for indeed it is the ugliest betrayal; and verily the treacherous one is humiliated in the sight of Allah
The worst treachery is divulging the secret [that has been entrusted to you]
Eschew treachery, for indeed it takes you away from the Qur’an
One who acts treacherously is sullied by his treachery

Wisdom: مَا أَخْلَقَ مَنْ غَدَرَ أَنْ لَا يُوفَى لَهُ
enWisdom: How appropriate it is for the treacherous one to be dealt with disloyally
There is no faith in the treacherous
